properties.description: Our library space is open to all providing free WiFi, PC use, online access and phone charging facilities. A family friendly space with jigsaws, games and drawing table. Regular program of free groups and events including our Wellbeing Drama Group this winter.
properties.title: Bellingham Library

properties.address: Bellingham Library, Bellingham Town Hall, Manchester Square, Bellingham, Hexham, Northumberland, NE48 2AS
